title: Machine Learning
description: Electric Slide is a comparative implementation of artificial intelligence and machine learning algorithms to efficiently solve the classic sliding puzzle.

title: Blockchain Generator
description: Cryptomonsters is a Django app and simple ledger of monsters created by using block-chain technology and Python asynchronous integration.

title: Dog Adoption Matcher
description: Pooch Match suggests appropriate dog breeds based on a user's lifestyle and preferences and then offers a list of adoptable dogs in his or her area to adopt.
